markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Yshula](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2085)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 34

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Yshula](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2085)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Div" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=351" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #183: Field of Maidens](/Sources.aspx?ID=145) pg. 11</row>

**Perception** +17; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Daemonic](/Languages.aspx?ID=31); [telepathy 100 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +16, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +15, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +22, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +22, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +18, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +15, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +15, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +18

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +5

**Con** +3

**Int** +2

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +7
</row>

**Items**
bone key to the basement tunnels

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +19 

+1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)
</row>

**HP** 109

**Immunities**
[disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)

**Weaknesses**
[cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 5, good 5

**Hatred of Red** Pairakas hate the color red. They won't wear the color or willingly enter any place painted red. Given a choice, they'll attack a creature wearing red first. If barred from expressing their displeasure toward the color by force or some magical effect, they take 2d6 mental damage at the end of their turn.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, fly 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d8+6 slashing plus 1d6 evil and bubonic plague

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 25
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66)
- **4th**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34) (at will), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will), [Misdirection](/Spells.aspx?ID=198) (at will; self only), [Outcast's Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=211) (at will), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) (at will)

**Rituals** DC 25

- **1st**
[Div Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=46)

**Bubonic Plague**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) A creature can't remove the [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) condition while infected; **Saving Throw** DC 23 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 day; **Stage 1** fatigued (1 day); **Stage 2** [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) and fatigued (1 day); **Stage 3** enfeebled 3, fatigued, and take 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) every 1d20 minutes (1 day)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) Yshula can take the appearance of any Small or Medium [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=91) or [animal](/Traits.aspx?ID=9). This doesn't change his Speed or his attack and damage modifiers with the Strikes, but it might change the damage type his strikes deal.

**Cottage-Drained**   Yshula is [drained 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) and can't recover from his drained condition while he's in the cottage. These reductions are included in his statistics.

**Tormenting Dreams** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** Yshula torments a sleeping creature within 100 feet with visions of betrayals by loved ones and friends. The target must attempt a DC 25 Will save, with the effects of the [nightmare](/Monsters.aspx?ID=308) spell.

</column>
name: Yshula

They won't wear the color or willingly enter any place painted red. Given a choice, they'll attack a creature wearing red first. If barred from expressing their displeasure toward the color by force or some magical effect, they take 2d6 mental damage at the end of their turn. --- Speed 25 feet, fly 35 feet Melee Single Action claw +16 (Agile, Evil, Finesse, Magical), Damage 2d8+6 slashing plus 1d6 evil and bubonic plague Divine Innate Spells DC 25 - Cantrips (4th) Detect Magic - 4th Charm (at will), Dimension Door (at will), Misdirection (at will; self only), Outcast's Curse (at will), Suggestion (at will) Rituals DC 25 - 1st Div Pact Bubonic Plague (Disease) A creature can't remove the fatigued condition while infected; Saving Throw DC 23 Fortitude; Onset 1 day; Stage 1 fatigued (1 day); Stage 2 enfeebled 2 and fatigued (1 day); Stage 3 enfeebled 3, fatigued, and take 1d6 persistent bleed damage every 1d20 minutes (1 day) Change Shape Single Action (Concentrate, Divine, Polymorph, Transmutation) Yshula can take the appearance of any Small or Medium humanoid or animal. This doesn't change his Speed or his attack and damage modifiers with the Strikes, but it might change the damage type his strikes deal. Tormenting Dreams Two Actions (Divine, Emotion, Enchantment, Mental) Frequency once per day; Effect Yshula torments a sleeping creature within 100 feet with visions of betrayals by loved ones and friends.
